# Check your data called band_members, band_instruments and band_instruments2

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
?band_members
glimpse(band_members)
```


```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
?band_instruments
glimpse(band_instruments) 
```

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
?band_instruments2
glimpse(band_instruments2)
```

```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
band_instruments %>% 
  inner_join(., band_members, by = "name") 
```


```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
band_instruments %>% 
  inner_join(., band_members, by = c("name" = "name")) 
```



```{r message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
band_instruments %>% 
  left_join(., band_members, by = "name") 
```
